thread.title: Japan Launches Free WiFi On Mount Fuji
thread.title_full: Japan Launches Free WiFi On Mount Fuji

author: Damon Beres
title: Japan Launches Free WiFi On Mount Fuji
text:
Japan Launches Free WiFi On Mount Fuji Posted: reddit 
TOKYO (AP) â€” Climbers who reach the summit of Mount Fuji will now be able to share their achievement via free Wi-Fi. 
A Japanese mobile phone network says it will begin offering the service Friday at eight hotspots on Japan's most famous mountain, including the 3,776-meter (12,389-foot) summit. 
The initiative is aimed at attracting more overseas visitors to Shizuoka and Yamanashi, the two states that are home to Mount Fuji. From airports to subway and bus operators, Japan has been expanding free Wi-Fi service ahead of the 2020 Tokyo Olympics. 
Users on Mount Fuji will need to enter a user ID and password provided in fliers in English, Chinese and Korean that will be distributed at some trailheads. NTT DOCOMO Inc. will provide the service for 72 hours from the initial log-in. More:
